meanings.sent1: The wheat was millable, ready to be ground into flour.
meanings.sent2: The soft metal was millable, perfect for shaping into intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: The millable wood whispered to the carpenter, 'Shape me into something beautiful.'
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were millable, waiting to be refined into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The clay was millable, eager to be molded into a work of art.

meanings.sent1: The millable grains were processed efficiently in the factory.
meanings.sent2: The millable ore was extracted from the mine for further processing.
meanings.sent3: The millable fabric danced through the machinery, ready to be transformed.
meanings.sent4: Her millable skills were honed through years of practice.
meanings.sent5: The millable material flowed smoothly through the milling equipment.
